verses.verse: He who separates himself seeks to gain his own desire; he breaks out against all sound wisdom.
A fool has no delight in understanding, but only in uncovering his heart.
When the wicked one comes, scorn also comes, and with shame comes reproach.
The words of a man's mouth are like deep waters, the fountain of wisdom is a flowing stream.
To lift up the face of the wicked one is not good, to thrust aside the righteous one in judgment.
The lips of a foolish one enter into strife, and his mouth calls for strokes.
The mouth of a fool is his ruin, and his lips are the snare of his soul.
The words of a slanderer are greedily swallowed; yea, they go down into the innermost parts of the belly.
And he who is slack in his work, he is a brother to a master of destruction.
The name of Jehovah is a tower of strength; the righteous one runs into it and is set on high.
The rich man's wealth is his strong city, and as a high wall in his imagination.
Before shattering, a man's heart is haughty, but humility goes before honor.
One turning back a matter before he hears it, it is folly and shame to him.
The spirit of a man will endure his sickness, but who can bear a stricken spirit?
The heart of one being discerning gets knowledge, and the ear of the wise one seeks knowledge.
A man's bribe makes room for him, and it leads him before the great.
The first in his cause seems to be a just one, but his neighbor comes and examines him.
The lot causes contentions to cease, and divides between the mighty ones.
A brother transgressing is like a city of strength; and their contentions are like the bar of a castle.
A man's belly shall be satisfied with the fruit of his mouth; he shall be satisfied with the produce of his lips.
Death and life are in the hand of the tongue, and those who love it shall eat its fruit.
He finding a wife finds good, and obtains favor from Jehovah.
The one being poor speaks with entreaties, but the rich one answers fiercely.
A man of friends may be broken up, but there is a Lover who sticks closer than a brother.
